body:
Hey guys,
I'm making my own server and i need help with something. This mostly goes out to the help of Map Developers but you all are welcome to help! Okay So I need help with a plugin. You know the bukkit commands or the Essentials commands for my newly created server. I'm wondering what would be the BEST one in your opinion that you have used. If you reply can you please maybe give me a link?
If you reply can you maybe give me a link. If not thats fine I will do my best to find it. Oh and btw its only for 1.8 please!
Thanks!

title: My own server that may need some help?

replies.body: The Essentials plugin would be what you're looking for.
replies.body_tagged: The Essentials plugin would be what you're looking for.

replies.body: I know but any certain websites where i can download it from??
replies.body_tagged: I know but any certain websites where i can download it from??

reply_to.body: I know but any certain websites where i can download it from??

replies.body:
Some really good helpful plugins :
Essentails
groupmanager 
vault
Maintantence 
Custom MOTD

Let me know if you need help and group manager is permissions and needs essentials to run I can set up how the tags work if you want.
